title: Bug 114905 - Default value in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value that was initially set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value in the list box.
3. Modify the default value in the list box.
4. Observe that the modified default value is not retained and is lost.
